text: Here ’ s to the last of them! Nikki Reed is finished taking her placenta pills after welcoming her first child over the summer. Celeb Moms Who Ate Their Placenta “ Last day of placenta pills, ” the Twilight actress, 29, captioned a photo of herself on Thursday, October 19, appearing to look upset about her nearly empty jar. “ Not ready to say goodbye!!!!! ” Last day of placenta pills. Not ready to say goodbye!!!!! A post shared by Nikki Reed ( @ iamnikkireed ) on Oct 19, 2017 at 12 : 05pm PDT Many other stars have chosen to eat their placenta after giving birth, including January Jones, Mayim Bialik, Blac Chyna, Alicia Silverstone and Kourtney
